name: mmenu-js
author: Fred Heusschen <info@frebsite.nl>
description: The best javascript plugin for app look-alike on- and off-canvas menus with sliding submenus for your website and webapp.

scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.publish:major: npm version major && npm run build && npm publish
